}}'''2.0.1049''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) or '''2.0.1051''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on May 8, 2018.

== Changes ==
* Removed the "Allow Mojang to collect user data" toggle.
* Changed access to ''Minecraft'' versions.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-8432}}: Attempting to use "Forgot Password" on windows doesn't open the link in the default browser.
* {{bug|MCL-9178}}: "Need Assistance?" link in skins tab does not work.
